mapper.select: WITH TEMP AS( SELECT USER_ID AS CNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(JOIN_DATE,'rrrr-mm--dd'),'yyyy') AS YY, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(JOIN_DATE,'rrrr-mm--dd'),'mm') AS MM FROM MEMBER ) SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '01' THEN CNT END) "M01", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '02' THEN CNT END) "M02", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '03' THEN CNT END) "M03", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '04' THEN CNT END) "M04", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '05' THEN CNT END) "M05", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '06' THEN CNT END) "M06", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '07' THEN CNT END) "M07", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '08' THEN CNT END) "M08", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '09' THEN CNT END) "M09", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '10' THEN CNT END) "M10", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '11' THEN CNT END) "M11", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '12' THEN CNT END) "M12" FROM TEMP WHERE YY ='2018' GROUP BY YY;

WITH TEMP2 AS( SELECT USER_ID AS CNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(JOIN_DATE,'rrrr-mm--dd'),'yyyy') AS YY, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(JOIN_DATE,'rrrr-mm--dd'),'mm') AS MM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(JOIN_DATE,'rrrr-mm--dd'),'W') AS WW FROM MEMBER ) SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '1' THEN CNT END) "W01", COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '2' THEN CNT END) "W02", COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '3' THEN CNT END) "W03", COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '4' THEN CNT END) "W04", COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '5' THEN CNT END) "W05" FROM TEMP2 WHERE YY = '2018' AND MM ='02' GROUP BY YY,MM ;

WITH TEMP AS( SELECT USER_ID AS CNT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(JOIN_DATE,'rrrr-mm--dd'),'yyyy') AS YY, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(JOIN_DATE,'rrrr-mm--dd'),'mm') AS MM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(JOIN_DATE,'rrrr-mm--dd'),'dd') AS DD FROM MEMBER ) SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '01' THEN CNT END) "D01", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '02' THEN CNT END) "D02", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '03' THEN CNT END) "D03", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '04' THEN CNT END) "D04", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '05' THEN CNT END) "D05", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '06' THEN CNT END) "D06", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '07' THEN CNT END) "D07", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '08' THEN CNT END) "D08", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '09' THEN CNT END) "D09", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '10' THEN CNT END) "D10", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '11' THEN CNT END) "D11", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '12' THEN CNT END) "D12", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '13' THEN CNT END) "D13", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '14' THEN CNT END) "D14", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '15' THEN CNT END) "D15", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '16' THEN CNT END) "D16", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '17' THEN CNT END) "D17", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '18' THEN CNT END) "D18", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '19' THEN CNT END) "D19", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '20' THEN CNT END) "D20", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '21' THEN CNT END) "D21", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '22' THEN CNT END) "D22", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '23' THEN CNT END) "D23", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '24' THEN CNT END) "D24", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '25' THEN CNT END) "D25", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '26' THEN CNT END) "D26", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '27' THEN CNT END) "D27", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '28' THEN CNT END) "D28", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '29' THEN CNT END) "D29", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '30' THEN CNT END) "D30", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '31' THEN CNT END) "D31" FROM TEMP WHERE YY = '2018' AND MM ='01' GROUP BY YY,MM ;

WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT PROJECT_NO AS "CNT", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy') AS "YY", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'mm') AS "MM", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'dd') AS "DD", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'W') AS "WW" FROM PROJECT ) SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '01' THEN CNT END) "M01", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '02' THEN CNT END) "M02", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '03' THEN CNT END) "M03", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '04' THEN CNT END) "M04", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '05' THEN CNT END) "M05", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '06' THEN CNT END) "M06", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '07' THEN CNT END) "M07", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '08' THEN CNT END) "M08", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '09' THEN CNT END) "M09", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '10' THEN CNT END) "M10", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '11' THEN CNT END) "M11", COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '12' THEN CNT END) "M12" FROM TEMP WHERE YY ='2018' GROUP BY YY;

WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT PROJECT_NO AS "CNT", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy') AS "YY", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'mm') AS "MM", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'dd') AS "DD", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'W') AS "WW" FROM PROJECT ) SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '1' THEN CNT END) "W01", COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '2' THEN CNT END) "W02", COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '3' THEN CNT END) "W03", COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '4' THEN CNT END) "W04", COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '5' THEN CNT END) "W05" FROM TEMP WHERE YY = '2018' AND MM ='10' GROUP BY YY,MM ;

WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT PROJECT_NO AS "CNT", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy') AS "YY", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'mm') AS "MM", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'dd') AS "DD", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'W') AS "WW" FROM PROJECT ) SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '01' THEN CNT END) "D01", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '02' THEN CNT END) "D02", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '03' THEN CNT END) "D03", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '04' THEN CNT END) "D04", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '05' THEN CNT END) "D05", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '06' THEN CNT END) "D06", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '07' THEN CNT END) "D07", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '08' THEN CNT END) "D08", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '09' THEN CNT END) "D09", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '10' THEN CNT END) "D10", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '11' THEN CNT END) "D11", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '12' THEN CNT END) "D12", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '13' THEN CNT END) "D13", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '14' THEN CNT END) "D14", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '15' THEN CNT END) "D15", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '16' THEN CNT END) "D16", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '17' THEN CNT END) "D17", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '18' THEN CNT END) "D18", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '19' THEN CNT END) "D19", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '20' THEN CNT END) "D20", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '21' THEN CNT END) "D21", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '22' THEN CNT END) "D22", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '23' THEN CNT END) "D23", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '24' THEN CNT END) "D24", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '25' THEN CNT END) "D25", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '26' THEN CNT END) "D26", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '27' THEN CNT END) "D27", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '28' THEN CNT END) "D28", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '29' THEN CNT END) "D29", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '30' THEN CNT END) "D30", COUNT(CASE WHEN DD = '31' THEN CNT END) "D31" FROM TEMP WHERE YY = '2018' AND MM ='01' GROUP BY YY,MM ;

WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT PROGRESS CNT1, PROJECT_NO CNT2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy') AS "YY", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'mm') AS "MM", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'dd') AS "DD", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'W') AS "WW" FROM PROJECT ) SELECT ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '01' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '01' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M01", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '02' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '02' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M02", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '03' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '03' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M03", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '04' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '04' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M04", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '05' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '05' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M05", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '06' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '06' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M06", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '07' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '07' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M07", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '08' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '08' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M08", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '09' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '09' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M09", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '10' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '10' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M10", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '11' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '11' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M11", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '12' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN MM = '12' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "M12" FROM TEMP WHERE YY = '2018' GROUP BY YY;

WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT PROGRESS CNT1, PROJECT_NO CNT2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy') AS "YY", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'mm') AS "MM", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'dd') AS "DD", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PROJECT_NO,1,8),'yyyymmdd'),'W') AS "WW" FROM PROJECT ) SELECT ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '1' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '1' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "W01", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '2' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '2' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "W02", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '3' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '3' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "W03", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '4' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '4' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "W04", ROUND(NVL(( COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '5' AND CNT1='003' THEN CNT1 END)/NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN WW = '5' THEN CNT2 END),0)*100),0),2) "W05" FROM TEMP WHERE YY = '2018' AND MM ='11' GROUP BY YY,MM ;
